front.title: Mother of Monsters
front.setup: At the start of the game Echidna enters play Mother of Monsters side up. Search the villain deck for all Twisted cards; shuffle them, and put the top H + 2 to the side as the Twisted side-deck. Set the other Twisted cards aside

gameplay.p: When flipped to this side, Echidna deals H + 2 melee damage to the hero target with the highest HP
Whenever a card enters the trash, Echidna regains 1 HP
Whenever Echidna deals at least 8 - H damage in a single instance, search the villain deck and trash for an 'Engulfed' card, and put it into play
At the end of the villain turn, if no hero target took damage in the last round, flip Echidna

front.advanced: Reduce damage dealt to Echidna by 1

back.title: Noelle, Canny Tactician

gameplay.p: When flipped to this side, destroy H hero cards
Whenever a card enters the trash, Echidna regains 1 HP
At the start of the villain turn, flip Echidna

back.advanced: When flipped to this side, search the villain deck and trash for an 'Engulfed' card and put it into play

text.p: Place this card next to a hero that does not already have an 'Engulfed' card next to them.
The hero this card is next to must skip a phase (play, power, draw) each turn.
Whenever the hero this card is next to skips a phase, they deal themselves 2 psychic damage
Play the top card of the Twisted side-deck
If this card is not next to a hero target, destroy it

card.name: Chimaerical Nightmare
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to Echidna by 2. A the end of the villain turn, Echidna regains 2 HP

card.name: Experimentation
card.text: Reveal the top X cards of the villain deck, where X is the number of Twisted cards in play + 1. Put any revealed One-Shots into play. Shuffle the remaining cards back into the deck

card.name: Bullrush
card.text: Echidna deals H melee damage to the hero target with the lowest HP

card.name: Squad Tactics
card.text: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1

card.name: Crush
card.text: Echidna deals H damage to any hero target with an 'Engulfed' card next to them

card.name: Psychological Warfare
card.text: At the start of the villain turn Echidna deals 2 psychic damage to all hero targets

card.name: Slippery
card.text: A hero may discard their hand. If they don't, Echidna is immune to damage until the start of her next turn
